document.topic_text: From Sports on Earth WritersAugust 22, 2016 - 12:32am Why aren't more people talking about this Blue Jays pitching staff? With J.A. Happ and Aaron Sanchez in the Cy Young Award conversation and others stepping up, Toronto has the most underrated pitching in the American League.
document.post: From Sports on Earth WritersAugust 22, 2016 - 12:32am Why aren't more people talking about this Blue Jays pitching staff? With J.A. Happ and Aaron Sanchez in the Cy Young Award conversation and others stepping up, Toronto has the most underrated pitching in the American League.
